DOC.brief_summary: Phase I : To investigate maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) , safety tolerability , pharmacokinetics , exploratory biomarker efficacy BI 836858 monotherapy patient low intermediate-1 risk myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) symptomatic anemia . Phase II : To investigate safety efficacy BI 836858 plus Best Supportive Care compare Best Supportive Care alone low intermediate-1 risk MDS patient symptomatic anemia without deletion 5q cytogenetic abnormality .
